  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz

  • Graphics: 256MB DX9 (shader model 2.0)

requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/Win 8/Win 10
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB DX10 (shader model 3.0)
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
